verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w looked|strong="G3708"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G0191"\w* \w were|strong="G3778"\w*, \w of|strong="G5456"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Come|strong="G1096"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* hither, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* shew thee \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w done|strong="G1096"\w* hereafter.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w set|strong="G2749"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w*, \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sight|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w jasper|strong="G2393"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* sardine \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G3664"\w* \w rainbow|strong="G2463"\w* round \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w sight|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* unto \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w emerald|strong="G4664"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* round \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* seats; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* seats, \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* ancients \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w garments|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w crowns|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w gold|strong="G5552"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w proceeded|strong="G1607"\w* lightnings, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunders|strong="G1027"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w lamps|strong="G2985"\w* \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sight|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3788"\w*, \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w glass|strong="G5193"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w crystal|strong="G2930"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w round|strong="G2945"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w were|strong="G3788"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creatures|strong="G2226"\w*, \w full|strong="G1073"\w* \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behind|strong="G3693"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creature|strong="G2226"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creature|strong="G2226"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w calf|strong="G3448"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creature|strong="G2226"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w*, \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fourth \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creature|strong="G2226"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w an|strong="G2192"\w* \w eagle|strong="G0105"\w* \w flying|strong="G4072"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w living|strong="G2226"\w* \w creatures|strong="G2226"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w each|strong="G0303"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w wings|strong="G4420"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* round \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w within|strong="G2081"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* rested \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w creatures|strong="G2226"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* honour, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* benediction \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G1325"\w* \w that|strong="G3752"\w* sitteth \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* liveth \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*;

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* ancients \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* sitteth \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* adored \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* liveth \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w crowns|strong="G4735"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*:

Thou art \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* honour, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w* thou hast \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* thy \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w created|strong="G2936"\w*.
